metadata.name: Edith Piaf - Studio Harcourt
metadata.description:
Edith Piaf, photographed by Studio Harcourt in 1950

Edith Piaf is France's most famous singer. 
Her most popular songs include "La Vie en Rose" (also the title of an Academy Award-winning biopic of the star in 2007, played with Oscar-winning actress Marion Cotillard)
Piaf remains a beloved figure in France and abroad; her life is the subject of several films and television specials. She influenced countless singers and stories as she remains a major piece of the French cultural heritage.

Studio Harcourt,
Prestigious Maison founded in 1934, the studio Harcourt has defined the industryâ€™s codes for black & white photo portraits in its Parisian studio.
Part of the French cultural heritage and the iconic Parisian style, the famous studio signature is now stepping into the digital realm.

Silver Moon,
Design studio specializing in the creation of digital art.
With a team and a history originating from Paris, digital artistic creation is at the heart of the activity of this modern studio which brings traditional art into the digital world.
